definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: That meant political troublemakers who did not have a lot of support.
sentences.chinese: 其意思是少有支持者的政壇搗亂分子。

sentences.english: The horse arrived, and it was a rare " thousand-mile".
sentences.chinese: 馬到了，果然是一匹天下少有的千里馬。

sentences.english: Even his rare mistakes can be made to be independent of any detours. Thus, on p.
sentences.chinese: 甚至他少有的錯誤也被認爲是獨立於任何繞彎的。

sentences.english: The most expensive desert in the world – the $1000 sundae.
sentences.chinese: 世界上少有昂貴聖代，要1000美元一杯。

sentences.english: It was rare, she said, rifling through a patient's tattered record.
sentences.chinese: 這是少有的，她說，通過病人的破爛的紀錄膛線。

sentences.english: Few foods can hold a candle to this leafy green.
sentences.chinese: 少有蔬菜能與這種多葉綠色植物比肩。

sentences.english: An encounter with an elusive Canada Lynx is said to be a rare privelege.
sentences.chinese: 據說能遇到難以捉摸的加拿大猞猁是少有的機會。

sentences.english: The TV series DaRanFang has been shown to be an excellent production since these years.
sentences.chinese: 電視劇《大染坊》是近年來少有的優秀之作。

sentences.english: However, rarely research reports the application of FTS in laparoscopic colorectal surgery.
sentences.chinese: 然而有關腹腔鏡結直腸手術與其聯合應用少有報道。

sentences.english: The harmfulness of eunuch to political chaos is rare in ancient history.
sentences.chinese: 其專權亂政危害程度是古代歷史上少有的。

sentences.english: But to the folks, there are seldom experts or scholars of their own, not to mention consultants or advisers.
sentences.chinese: 只是民衆卻少有屬於自己的專家學者，遑論顧問智囊。

sentences.english: Since there's less upfront investment in Cloud Computing, mistakes are easily forgiven.
sentences.chinese: 由於在雲計算較少有前期投資，錯誤應很容易原諒。

sentences.english: This is one of the rare moments when Hessler’s emotions bleed into the writing.
sentences.chinese: 這是赫斯勒在書中少有的動情場面。

sentences.english: The Chinese natural inkstones are of rare Beauty in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中國天然石硯之美當屬世界少有。

sentences.english: This is one golf course hidden in hurst, near sea and hill.
sentences.chinese: 這是樹林裏隱藏的高爾夫球場，少有的依山傍海。

sentences.english: Revelations from the rest of my government database searches were less sensational.
sentences.chinese: 我在政府數據庫中搜索的其餘結果少有聳人聽聞之感。

definition: can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/just a handful/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.
